cleaned_text: California Alternative Energy and Advanced Transportation Financing Authority (CAEATFA) Quick Links Highlights [Notice of Intent to Award Contract No. CAEATFA01-23](intent-to-award.pdf) Posted 6/21/2023 [Addendum 1 Responses to Questions for RFP CAEATFA01-23](CAEATFA0123.pdf) Posted 6/14/2023 [Request for Proposals (RFP) for PACE Loss Reserve Trustee #CAEATFA01-23](CAEATFA01-23.pdf) Posted 6/2/2023 [Updated Notice of Sales and Use Tax Exclusion Program 2023 Calendar Year Application Periods](/caeatfa/ste/amended.pdf) Posted 06/05/23 [Sales and Use Tax Exclusion Applications Considered Date](/caeatfa/ste/pipeline.pdf) Updated 07/14/2023 [Updates from the CHEEF Programs](cheef/updates.asp) [Video: Introduction to the Residential Energy Efficiency Loan Program](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j9c1r5XtP6E) The California Alternative Energy and Advanced Transportation Financing Authority (CAEATFA) works collaboratively with public and private partners to provide innovative and effective financing solutions for California's industries, assisting in reducing the state's greenhouse gas emissions by increasing the development and deployment of renewable energy sources, energy efficiency, and advanced transportation and manufacturing technologies to reduce air pollution, conserve energy, and promote economic development and jobs.
